text: Va agar ʙuʙinī ej Pajomʙar on hangomro, ki dar ʙaroʙari Parvardigoraşon istodaand onhoe, ki zinda gardonidani ʙa'd az mironidanro inkor karda ʙudand, gufta şavad: «Ojo in haq nest?» Gūjand: «Ore, savgand ʙa Parvardigoramon!» Gūjad (Alloh ta'olo): «Ba saʙaʙi kufre, ki ʙa Alloh va rasulaş dar dunjo mevarzided, azoʙro ʙicaşed!»
